ygData.subject: Re: Question about multiple characters
ygData.msgSnippet: I play Stargazer Erudite Enchanter on Fennin Ro almost exclusively. I have a Barbarian Shaman level 5 also on Fennin Ro but he s just sitting there waiting for
ygData.messageBody:
I play Stargazer Erudite Enchanter on Fennin Ro almost exclusively.
I have a Barbarian Shaman level 5 also on Fennin Ro but he's just
sitting there waiting for me to get bored playing my enchanter.

In my frustration with the lack of role-playing on Fennin Ro, I started
a bard on the PvP server and ran him up to lvl 4 or 5, but the first
couple of times I took him out of the newbie zone I found groups of
level 8 dark elves sitting there PKing over and over again without so
much as a nod to rp'ing so I gave that up.

-----Original Message-----
From: DeGirolami, Franck [mailto:degirolami@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 2:21 PM
To: Eqenchanters (E-mail)
Subject: [eqenchanters] Question about multiple characters


From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>

How many of you are playing multiple characters at the same time?
I played first a dark elf necro up to level 16..
my main character is now an enchanter level 20..I've been playing her a lot
but since Saturday ( which is when I leveled ) I havent been fighting at
all, I'm in one of those travelling / meeting people mood.
Anyway, this morning I started a bard...I dont why ...I completely gave up
my necro when I started to play my enchanter. I dont want to do that this
time, but sometimes I get bored and I need something new...

Skara de Toxxulia
